DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Assess efficacy safety tacrolimus ointment use adult moderate severe atopic dermatitis . The ointment apply affected skin twice daily 3 week daily lesion clear
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Assess Efficacy Safety Tacrolimus Ointment Treatment Atopic Dermatitis Adult Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The study one arm non-comparative study . The study medication Tacrolimus ointment 0.1 % ( Protopic ® 0.1 % ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female , ethnic group , age ≥16 Moderate severe atopic dermatitis Has give inform consent Erythroderma Pregnant breastfeed Skin infection affect area
